name: TSHST Restaurant
description:
Hey There, this my my game dev beginning. 

In this Game the player is going to fight the Eye Monster, he has already defeated by the Hearing monster and lost its hearing sense, and now he is human blind :P means he has killed his eyes to see the eye monster and lost the sight to see his mates. 

When  he defeates the Eye Monster he will be able to remove all his blindness and will be able to meet his mates.

Now show your Power to beat all his problems.

Hope you Enjoy the Game :)
